fields.name: Cannondale Quick Disc 5 City Bike 2021 Matte Black
fields.description: A swift, sporty bike that’s perfect for getting a workout, city cruising or just getting out and feeling good. Highlights are Lightweight aluminum frame with 360° reflective accents, Shimano Tourney TX 14-speed drivetrain with disc brakes and Integrated connectivity with Cannondale App

fields.name: Merida Speeder 100D 2021 Blue
fields.description: Redesigned for MY20 with more sporty geometry with longer reach. The frame can accomodate wider tyres making it more versatile - up to 37mm (32mm with mudguards). All models run hydraulic disc brakes for all weather reliability and come with a tapered carbon fork.

fields.name: Ridgeback Comet Standard Frame Red 2021
fields.description: The Comet is built around a confidence inspiring 6061 heat treated aluminium frame and a chromoly fork to give you a stable and comfortable ride. It has been finished with a single chainring up front to keep maintenance low and a high-quality Shimano 7 speed 11-32 cassette to still offer a gear range that will allow you to take on any terrain. stopping is taken care of by Promax V-Brakes front and rear to make the Comet a fantastic all-round urban bike.

fields.name: Skoda City Lady Classic Bike
fields.description: The ŠKODA CITY Lady bike in a stunning retro style is primarily designed for cycling around town in comfort. It features a low step-over frame, making it easy to get on and off the bike. The cream frame and mudguards, a comfy imitation leather saddle and brown tyres with reflective strips enhance the exceptional design of this bike.

fields.name: KTM Life Lite City Bike White 2020
fields.description: The ŠKODA CITY Lady bike in a stunning retro style is primarily designed for cycling around town in comfort. It features a low step-over frame, making it easy to get on and off the bike. The cream frame and mudguards, a comfy imitation leather saddle and brown tyres with reflective strips enhance the exceptional design of this bike.
